name: Burn Your Brain
description:
This is a game im making in html. The idea is to make a really really hard puzzle game. That's why the hell theme. The goal is to have 5 lit candles on the center. Rotate the platforms to achive that.

If you are wodering how do you make a game in HTML, I made a class in Skillshare for that https://skl.sh/2Gu5tLH
